name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>基地<rt>ベース</rt></ruby><ruby>守護神<rt>ガーディアン</rt></ruby>ミスショット

requirement.en: Shuffle 3 Level 3 LIGHT Attribute Reptile Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: This card gains 3000 ATK until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you activated this effect during the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing "Elite Secret Investigator Mystery", you can destroy up to 3 face-up Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field.
